directions: In a large sauce pan, heat oil over medium low heat. Add the onion, bell pepper, garlic and spices and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in the water, quinoa, corn, and tomato sauce. Bring to a boil then reduce heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes. Add the beans and kale and simmer for an additional 5 minutes, or until kale has softened.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon ghee, or butter, or olive oil
⅔ cup quinoa, rinsed with warm water
1 small bunch of kale, destemmed and coarsely chopped
title: Vegetarian Quinoa Chili with Kale and Red Beans
